name: part_006
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】STARt IN THE SCREEEN!【#星街すいせい50万人記念ライブ】 [JNmmnB4bP0M]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: MC section with Hoshimachi Suisei, Tokoyami Towa, and Amane Kanata discussing their performance.
Transition and instrumental intro for the next song.

subtitles.original: あ、ね！
subtitles.english: Ah, right!

subtitles.original: あとはね、ね！
subtitles.english: And also, right!

subtitles.original: ね、もう、トワ様と一緒に…
subtitles.english: Right, together with Towa-sama...

subtitles.original: 本当に、最後の最後までダンスを…
subtitles.english: Really, right up until the very end, the dance...

subtitles.original: ダンスをね。
subtitles.english: The dance, right.

subtitles.original: そう、ここはね、こうやってこうやってこうだよ、みたいな。
subtitles.english: Yeah, like, "This part goes like this, this, and this."

subtitles.original: そうだね、運動音痴が、すいちゃんのね、すごいきれいな…
subtitles.english: Right, my lack of coordination... Suisei's really beautiful...

subtitles.original: そう、めっちゃ最後まで教えてもらってたんだよね。
subtitles.english: Yeah, she was teaching us right until the end.

subtitles.original: ギリギリまでやってます！
subtitles.english: We're doing it until the very last minute!

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: どうだったかな？ ダンスまでね、ちょっと頑張ってみましたけれども。
subtitles.english: How was it? We tried our best with the dancing too.

subtitles.original: そう、トワ様もダンスすごかったって。
subtitles.english: Yeah, Towa-sama's dancing was amazing too.

subtitles.original: よかったー！
subtitles.english: I'm so glad!

subtitles.original: すごい！
subtitles.english: Amazing!

subtitles.original: トレンド1位！ ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Trending #1! Thank you!

subtitles.original: あー！ おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Ah! Congratulations!

subtitles.original: 嬉しい！
subtitles.english: I'm so happy!

subtitles.original: 本当に本当におめでとう、すいちゃん！
subtitles.english: Truly, congratulations, Sui-chan!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、二人をお呼びいたしましたけれども。
subtitles.english: Alright, so, I invited these two here.

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: 実は…
subtitles.english: Actually...

subtitles.original: お？
subtitles.english: Oh?

subtitles.original: ゲストが！
subtitles.english: There's a guest!

subtitles.original: おお？ おおー！
subtitles.english: Oh? Oh!

subtitles.original: ということで、このあともお楽しみに！
subtitles.english: So, please look forward to what's coming up next!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ここから… ここから… だんだん… 次の曲、行ってまいりましょう！
subtitles.english: From here... from here... gradually... let's head into the next song!

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: 強くなれる理由を知った 僕を連れて進め
subtitles.english: I found a reason to be strong, take me with you and move forward.

subtitles.original:
紅蓮華
作詞：LiSA / 作曲：草野華余子
subtitles.english:
Gurenge
Lyrics: LiSA / Composition: Kayoko Kusano

subtitles.original: 進め
subtitles.english: Move forward

subtitles.original: 泥だらけの走馬灯に酔う こわばる心
subtitles.english: Drunk on a mud-stained kaleidoscope, a stiffened heart.

subtitles.original: 震える手は掴みたいものがある それだけさ
subtitles.english: My trembling hands have something they want to grasp, that's all.

subtitles.original: 夜の匂いに空睨んでも
subtitles.english: Even if I glare at the sky in the scent of the night,

subtitles.original: 変わっていけるのは自分自身だけ それだけさ
subtitles.english: The only one who can change is myself, that's all.

subtitles.original: 強くなれる理由を知った 僕を連れて進め
subtitles.english: I found a reason to be strong, take me with you and move forward.

subtitles.original: どうしたって！ 消せない夢も 止まれない今も
subtitles.english: No matter what! A dream that can't be erased, a present that can't stop.

subtitles.original: 誰かのために強くなれるなら ありがとう 悲しみよ
subtitles.english: If I can become strong for someone's sake, thank you, sadness.

subtitles.original: 世界に打ちのめされて負ける意味を知った
subtitles.english: I learned the meaning of defeat after being beaten down by the world.

subtitles.original: 紅蓮の華よ咲き誇れ！ 運命を照らして
subtitles.english: Crimson lotus flower, bloom in full! Illuminate my destiny.

subtitles.original: イナビカリの雑音が耳を刺す 戸惑う心
subtitles.english: The noise of lightning stabs my ears, a bewildered heart.

subtitles.original: 優しいだけじゃ守れないものがある？ わかってるけど
subtitles.english: Are there things that can't be protected by kindness alone? I know, but...

subtitles.original: 水面下で絡まる善悪 透けて見える偽善に天罰
subtitles.english: Good and evil entangled beneath the surface, divine punishment for visible hypocrisy.

subtitles.original: Tell me why, I don't need you!
subtitles.english: Tell me why, I don't need you!

subtitles.original: 逸才の花より 挑み続け咲いた一輪が美しい
subtitles.english: More beautiful than a flower of talent is a single blossom that bloomed through constant challenge.

subtitles.original: 乱暴に敷き詰められたトゲだらけの道も
subtitles.english: Even a path roughly covered with thorns,

subtitles.original: 本気の僕だけに現れるから 乗り越えてみせるよ
subtitles.english: Will only appear to the serious me, so I'll show you I can overcome it.

subtitles.original: 簡単に片付けられた守れなかった夢も
subtitles.english: Even the dreams that couldn't be protected, easily brushed aside,

subtitles.original: 紅蓮の心臓に根を癒やし この地に宿ってる
subtitles.english: Heal their roots in a crimson heart and dwell in this land.

subtitles.original: Ah...
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: 強くなれる理由を知った 僕を連れて進め
subtitles.english: I found a reason to be strong, take me with you and move forward.

subtitles.original: どうしたって！ 消せない夢も 止まれない今も
subtitles.english: No matter what! A dream that can't be erased, a present that can't stop.

subtitles.original: 誰かのために強くなれるなら ありがとう 悲しみよ
subtitles.english: If I can become strong for someone's sake, thank you, sadness.

subtitles.original: 世界に打ちのめされて負ける意味を知った
subtitles.english: I learned the meaning of defeat after being beaten down by the world.

subtitles.original: 紅蓮の華よ咲き誇れ！ 運命を照らして
subtitles.english: Crimson lotus flower, bloom in full! Illuminate my destiny.

subtitles.original: 運命を照らして
subtitles.english: Illuminate my destiny.
